cta.title: Discover the Authentic Art of Thai Wellness
cta.text: Ready to release tensions and find your balance? Our traditional Thai massage treatments are designed to promote wellbeing, relaxation and body harmony.

about-page.description: Meet Ann, certified Thai massage practitioner trained at Thailand's premier institutions. Professional practice in Gazzada Schianno with 16+ years expertise.
about-page.title: From Personal Experience to Professional Calling
about-page.p-1: I understand chronic pain personally. After experiencing complete renewal through authentic Thai massage, I knew I had to share this powerful tradition. Your wellness journey matters because mine changed everything.
about-page.p-2: Authentic expertise requires serious dedication. I've invested 16+ years studying with Thailand's master practitioners, earning official Ministry of Health certification. Every technique I use honors centuries-old wisdom passed through generations.
about-page.p-3: Every client receives my complete attention and expertise. I listen carefully, assess thoroughly, and apply techniques specifically chosen for your condition. My commitment is simple: providing the same authentic wellness that transformed my life.
about-page.p-4: After experiencing true renewal myself, helping others find relief became my life's calling and joy.

items.heading: Ann's Journey to Italy
items.p: From experiencing personal renewal in Thailand to opening our doors in November 2025, this practice embodies 16 years of dedication. Ann has called Italy home since 2012, bringing authentic Thai wellness to Varese.

items.heading: Personalized Care Guaranteed
items.p: Every session receives Ann's complete attention and expertise. As a solo practitioner, she personally assesses your condition, tailors each treatment, and ensures continuity throughout your wellness journey.

items.heading: Professional Comfort
items.p: Our single dedicated treatment room provides absolute privacy and peace. Professional equipment, hospital-grade cleanliness, and convenient free parking options ensure you arrive relaxed and leave rejuvenated.

footer.p: Extra content if you need it, if not you can delete this whole p tag. I usually do.
